name: Minimalist Book Tracker
description: Simple Book Tracker Notion template that is done in minimalist design. This template aims at organizing your digital bookshelf and cutting out anything that is unimportant.Features:Track what you read nowTrack your upcoming readingsCategorize the books by Category, Genre, Author, Year you read the book, and more.View all the books you already read.Keep track of your favorite books in a dedicated bookshelf.Leave notes, takeaways, and quotes to any book you like. Bonus:Essential books on productiv
